授業方法:
Classes will be conducted on-line with Zoom, simultaneously and interactively. Students are expected to participate the first session of the course, so that we can discuss the format and contents of the course held in this quarter. Lectures, case studies and class discussions with student group presentations will be planned for the course.
Please refer to LUNA 3 days before the first session, check class announcements and review a more detailed version of syllabus along with your learning materials.
We will use LUNA for exchange of documents, and students are expected to submit assignments via LUNA.
